abstract: An antitrust lawsuit contends that an acquisition of TaxAct would lead to reduced competition and higher prices.
snippet: An antitrust lawsuit contends that an acquisition of TaxAct would lead to reduced competition and higher prices.
lead_paragraph: 5:43 p.m. | Updated A week after opposition from the Justice Department led Nasdaq OMX to abandon its $11 billion offer for NYSE Euronext, the antitrust division is challenging another proposed takeover, H&R Block‘s deal for the owner of TaxAct tax-preparation software.

headline.main: Justice Dept. Challenges H&R Block Deal
